adjective.description: Of or having a special activity, purpose, or task; relating to the way in which something works or operates.
examples: there are important functional differences between left and right brain

adjective.description: Designed to be practical and useful, rather than attractive.
examples: she had assumed the apartment would be functional and simple
the museum will be fully functional from the opening of the festival

adjective.description: Relating to a variable quantity whose value depends upon one or more other variables.
